title.computeroutput: Cannot convert X.Y into a Windows Bitmap file...

section.para: File X.Y cannot be converted into a Windows Bitmap file.
&Ghostscript; cannot be found.
&Ghostscript; is needed to render &PostScript; specials (e.g. EPS graphics). You can install it from the &MiKTeX; &CDR;.
Cannot locate MiKTeX Print Utility (mtprint.exe).
The DVI file cannot be opened for some reason.
Make sure that the DVI file exists and that you can access it.

title.computeroutput: Cannot open the TeX source file...

section.para: The &DVI; file contains no source specials.
Use the -src-specials option the next time you compile your TeX source file (see ).
Cannot start the editor on the &TeX; source file.
Make sure that command-line contains the placeholders %f and %l.
&Ghostscript; cannot be started for some reason.
You should inspect the diagnostic messages () to find the source of the problem.
MiKTeX Print Utility (mtprint.exe) cannot be started for some reason.
You should inspect the diagnostic messages () to find the source of the problem.
An outdated version of &Ghostscript; is installed.
&Yap; requires at least version 6.0 of &Ghostscript;. You can install it from the &MiKTeX; &CDR;.

title.computeroutput: Not all fonts could be loaded...

section.para: Not all fonts could be loaded.
You should inspect the document property sheet () to see which fonts could not be loaded.

title.computeroutput: Printer resolution X does not match...

section.para: The printer resolution does not match the selected METAFONT resolution.
Either select a different METAFONT mode ( View Options... ), or change the printer resolution ( File Print Setup... ).
MiKTeX Print Utility (mtprint.exe) failed for some reason.
You should inspect the diagnostic messages () to find the source of the problem.

title.computeroutput: Some pages could not be printed...

section.para: Some pages could not be printed.

title.computeroutput: The DVI file is currently used...

section.para: The DVI file is currently used by another application.
Wait a moment until the other application has released the DVI file.

title.computeroutput: This DVI document contains no source links...

section.para: The &DVI; file contains no source specials.

title.computeroutput: The DVI file does not exist...

section.para: The DVI file does not exist.

title.computeroutput: This is a bad DVI file...

section.para: The DVI file cannot be processed because it is not valid.

title.computeroutput: This is not a DVI file...

section.para: The file is not a DVI file.
